channel.title: lending on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in lending on FinanClub

item.title: UPST
item.description: score:58 Chances: Upstart Holdings, Inc. has been selected by Liberty Savings Bank for personal lending, indicating potential for growth in their partnership network. Despite recent declines, management expects revenue to increase in the first quarter, offering a potential short-term opportunity for investors. The company’s AI lending platform has significant upside, especially in the fintech industry where artificial intelligence is gaining prominence.

item.title: SOFI
item.description: score:125 Chances: SoFi’s fourth-quarter results showed rapid growth and effective monetization among millennials and Generation Z. The fintech operates through three segments: lending, financial services, and a technology platform. There may still be some uncertainty over interest rates, but high-quality growth stocks should still be considered.
